items.title: Wall Street loves this under-the-radar Nvidia derivative play
items.description: Shares have held steady so far this year, rising about 1%, while Nvidia stock has lost about 15%.

items.title: Ariel’s John Rogers says he’s been buying steadily throughout this downturn. What he’s buying
items.description: Rogers said his firm has added to its positions in entertainment stocks and a beaten-down cruise operator.

items.title: Betting on a continued tech comeback with less risk using options
items.description: Jeff Kilburg lays out a call spread in the QQQs.

items.description: The firm sees the potential for this chipmaker's shares to gain more than 40%.

items.title: 60 years at Berkshire: See Warren Buffett's 'Woodstock for Capitalists' over the decades
items.description: Review how this year's shareholder meeting will run and how it's evolved over the decades.
